data.text: Misu mefrɛɛ Onyankopɔn srɛɛ mmoa;
Bere a mewɔ ahohiahia mu no, mehwehwɛɛ Awurade;
Onyankopɔn mekaee wo, na misii apini;
Woamma mʼani ankum;
Medwenee nna a atwam no ho,
mekaee me nnwom a na meto no anadwo.
“Enti, Awurade bɛpo yɛn daa?
Nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da atu ayera koraa ana?
Onyankopɔn werɛ afi sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo ana?
Afei misusuwii se, “Eyi de, mɛsrɛ:
Mɛkae nneɛma a Awurade ayɛ;
Mɛdwene wo nnwuma nyinaa ho
Onyankopɔn, wʼakwan yɛ kronkron.
Wone Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwonwade;
Wode wo tumi nsa no gyee wo nkurɔfo,
Onyankopɔn, nsu no huu wo,
Omununkum tɔɔ nsu,
Wʼaprannaa bobɔɔ mu wɔ mfɛtɛ no mu,
Wode wo kwan faa po mu,
Wonam Mose ne Aaron abasa so,
